review.comment: My name is Genevieve and I had a stem cell treatment to my shoulder about 8 months ago from a NP and ended up getting an injury from the injection I received. I started to lose hope as I couldn’t do my regular house chores and normal hygiene routine. I heard of Dr Moore and how great he was from my daughter. I decided to see him and I’m so glad I did! In 4 weeks I’ve had major improvements in my shoulder to where I can do normal activities again without excruciating pain. Still have some time to heal but to be expected. Thank you Dr Moore for your kindness, understanding, and professional expertise.
review.review_reply: Jenna - thank you so much for taking time to share your experience. We're so glad we could help you!

review.comment:
I have been in construction for 25 years and my knees were a mess. I was at the point that I could not do my job and knew I needed to address the problem. I reached out to Dr Moore to avoid surgery. He was able to assess and treat me quickly. I am now able to do my job without restriction or pain.
I highly recommend Dr Moore and his team.
review.review_reply: Dan, we are so glad you reached out to us and that we could help get you back to normal 'life' without pain. We truly appreciate your review!

review.comment:
I was looking at knee surgery for a torn meniscus that was causing a lot of right knee pain.
It was getting to the point where the pain was limiting my activity waking me up at night but I had concerns about surgery.
I’m so thankful Dr Moore was able to take care of my knee so quickly.
The pain is gone and I’m back to doing all the things  I couldn’t.
I can’t believe how easy and effective the treatment is.
I recommend this place for any joint problems!
review.review_reply: Thank you Michael for your review and feedback, we're so glad we could help you get back to your life without pain!

review.comment: Thanks to Heber Valley Pain Solutions and the incredible team. We truly appreciate the time and patience you give to each patient - and the amazing work you are doing!
review.review_reply: Thanks for sharing your experience Ryan!
